ipa.body: We strive our best to ensure that the information displayed on the site related to an event is correct, however, such information is to be used as a guide only. In the event of any particular information (such as score, result, time of the event etc) being incorrect, we assume no liability for it. Please refer to our betting rules for information related to bet settlements. For the purpose of In-play betting, the player should be aware that live transmissions may be delayed. The extent of the delay may vary from a player to another.
ipa.title: Important note
